title: New leaverbuster system?
body: Ok so , I wasnt aware of the new leaverbuster system and i was really annoyed in a game (Im telling the truth) because we have 2 jg 1 top and 1 mid and i was stuck at bot against a cait and a trist, So i thought there was no point playing this and i d/c So know I am punished with the low priority thing, does this ware off? If not please help me ;( im very sad.{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: U left the game, suffer the consequences or uninstall
Can I at least get out of this punishment somehow?

Hey BlackThornVision,

You can find more about the LeaverBuster here.
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/updates-leaverbuster
